name: leanly
content:
leanly adverb
(NO WASTE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that does not use too many people or spend too much money, so that there is no waste: Generally speaking, private companies have to operate more leanly than public ones. The company is run from leanly staffed offices in London and Switzerland.
More examplesFewer examplesThese banks were small and leanly capitalized.

leanly adverb
(NO FAT)
with little or no fat: His body is long, thin, and leanly muscled. She is perhaps a little too leanly glamorous for the part.
